title: Mike's Game of the Year?
description:
Will Palworld make his list? From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DIKv_90SvsM&pp=ygUJZ2FtZXNjYXN0 

Go to http://harrys.com/KINDAFUNNY for a $3 Trial Set.

Head over to KindaFunny.com/store to pick up your copy of Portillo the Wiener Dog Thinks He’s a Manatee and the new line of Portillo merch!


FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!

transcript_chunks.text: yeah I just wanted to piggyback off of Greg before we went to the adbreak of you know we do such a great job highlighting our top 10 of the year but we don't really we rarely talk about like hey here's an old game that took over my life this year and so I want to applaud Greg for that and just you know Securo was that for me I know Kingdom Hearts was that for me last year we don't really get to highlight those like oh this game took over my life and it's an older title that like became new to me and I just want to make sure we get new content Mike and so yeah I just wanted to do that but let me get back to some UPS cuz I have I have a big list here Tim of like great games that I definitely want to talk about uh like Po World po world did steal the show this year and power world became that for me I'm always on the hunt for survival crafting games with Andy and the boys to play and power world was exactly what I've always dreamt of a open world Pokemon game to be right you see a Pokemon

for me I'm always on the hunt for survival crafting games with Andy and the boys to play and power world was exactly what I've always dreamt of a open world Pokemon game to be right you see a Pokemon off in the distance you battle it you catch it it becomes your team and you go out and explore with that Pokemon and that's what po world was where I was able to craft a base with my friends and we had our Pals out there working on the base with us they were out exploring with us battling other Pals they did a great job with these you know boss fights that you would go into the dungeon and fight the bosses with and they all had cool and unique Pals I I absolutely loved and adored our time with pal world it was when we talk about survival crafting games pal world is up at the top of the list of all those games for me that I want to play more of and get lost and stuck in this world when we when we would have some of the pals working too hard on the base for too long they would start to get
